name: Boreas
description:
Taken from our collection "The Great Northern Lights." Boreas was the purple-winged, Greek god of the north wind who brought winter. In Norse mythology it is believed that the god of winter, Ullr produced Aurora Borealis to illuminate the longest nights of the year.

The Boreas scarf is a sumptuous 100% silk scarf that has been dyed by hand using natural plant dyes and then hand painted to achieve the final lustrous design. Due to our unique working methods each scarf produced is completely unique.

-89cm x 89cm
-100% luxurious silk
-Unique hand painted design

Free postage within the UK. International postage calculated at checkout.

***Please note: all are items are made to order please expect between 7-12 days before shipping***

As our items are individually handmade, each scarf design will vary slightly from the one pictured

www.hokum.eu

name: Freja
description:
Taken from our collection "The Great Northern Lights," and named after the Viking goddess Freja. It was believed that the goddess riding on horseback across the sky, was seen by mortals as the glow of the northern lights.

The Freja scarf is a sumptuous 100% silk scarf that has been dyed by hand using natural plant dyes and then hand painted to achieve the final lustrous design. Due to our unique working methods each scarf produced is completely unique.

-89cm x 89cm
-100% luxurious silk
-Unique hand painted design

Free postage within the UK. International postage calculated at check out.

***Please note: all are items are made to order please expect between 7-12 days before shipping***

As our items are individually handmade, each scarf design will vary slightly from the one pictured

www.hokum.eu

name: Aurora
description:
Taken from our collection "The Great Northern Lights," Aurora was the Roman goddess of dawn. In Norse mythology it is believed that the god of winter, Ullr produced Aurora Borealis to illuminate the longest nights of the year.

The Aurora scarf is a sumptuous 100% silk scarf that has been dyed by hand using natural plant dyes and then hand painted to achieve the final lustrous design. Due to our unique working methods each scarf produced is completely unique.

-89cm x 89cm
-100% luxurious silk
-Unique hand painted design

name: Our Past Is Not Black and White
description:
"Our Past Is Not Black and White" is a collection inspired by historical portrait paintings from the Elizabethan period. Drawing inspiration from both the sitter and the fabrics they wore. 

Luxurious jewel-toned hues enrich each 100% silk scarf. Every scarf is dyed individually by hand using natural plant dyes-some of which were used by the Elizabethans.

-89cm x 89cm
-100% luxurious silk
-available in 4 colours

Free postage within the UK. International postage calculated at checkout

***Please note: all are items are made to order please expect between 7-12 days before shipping***

As our items are individually handmade, each scarf design will vary slightly from the one pictured

www.hokum.eu
